screen_desc: The screenshot shows a promotional page on Walmart's mobile website offering discounts on toys. The main content includes a toy display and a call-to-action button to "Shop now." The page also displays a search bar, a shopping cart with a notification, and a header banner for holiday decor discounts.
action_think: The user wants to view the shopping cart on Walmart and add an Acer Predator to it. The current screen shows the Walmart mobile website with a shopping cart icon and a search bar. Possible actions are to click on the shopping cart icon to view the cart and then click on the search bar to enter the item name.
action_plan: Click on the shopping cart icon to view the cart
Click on the search bar to enter the item name
action_desc: Click on the shopping cart icon located at the top right corner
action_result: The last action was to click on the shopping cart icon, which led to the cart page displaying the item already added. This action helps to view the contents of the shopping cart and access the checkout process. To progress towards the user request, one must now search for "Acer Predator" on Walmart, add it to the cart, and then proceed to checkout.
